mapper.insert: /* CardCreditMapper.getCardCreditSaveMerge */ MERGE INTO TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CARD_CREDIT_KWU USING DUAL ON ( HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND HQ_BRAND_CD = #{hqBrandCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND POS_NO = #{posNo} AND BILL_NO = #{billNo} AND LINE_NO = #{lineNo} AND LINE_SEQ_NO = #{lineSeqNo} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CREDIT_DATE = #{creditDate}, CREDIT_AMT = #{creditAmt}, CREDIT_FEE = #{creditFee}, CREDIT_BANK = #{creditBank}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, LINE_NO, LINE_SEQ_NO, CREDIT_DATE, CREDIT_AMT, CREDIT_FEE, CREDIT_BANK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, #{hqBrandCd}, #{storeCd}, #{saleDate}, #{posNo}, #{billNo}, #{lineNo}, #{lineSeqNo}, #{creditDate}, #{creditAmt}, #{creditFee}, #{creditBank}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* CardCreditMapper.getCardCreditExcelUploadAddSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO TB_TMP_EXCEL_CARD_CREDIT_KWU ( SESSION_ID, HQ_OFFICE_CD, STORE_CD, APPR_DATE, APPR_NO, CREDIT_DATE, CREDIT_AMT, CREDIT_FEE, CREDIT_BANK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{hqOfficeCd}, #{storeCd}, #{apprDate}, #{apprNo}, #{creditDate}, #{creditAmt}, #{creditFee}, #{creditBank}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* CardCreditMapper.getCardCreditExcelUploadAddRealSaveMerge */ MERGE INTO TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CARD_CREDIT_KWU A USING ( SELECT tsspc.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tsspc.HQ_BRAND_CD, tsspc.STORE_CD, tsspc.SALE_DATE, tsspc.POS_NO, tsspc.BILL_NO, tsspc.LINE_NO, tsspc.LINE_SEQ_NO, ttecck.CREDIT_DATE, ttecck.CREDIT_AMT, ttecck.CREDIT_FEE, ttecck.CREDIT_BANK, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CARD tsspc, ( SELECT REPLACE(C.APPR_DATE, '-', '') AS APPR_DATE, C.APPR_NO, REPLACE(C.CREDIT_DATE, '-', '') AS CREDIT_DATE, C.CREDIT_AMT, C.CREDIT_FEE, C.CREDIT_BANK FROM TB_TMP_EXCEL_CARD_CREDIT_KWU C, TB_CM_DATEM D WHERE 1=1 AND C.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND D.YYYYMMDD = REPLACE(C.CREDIT_DATE, '-', '') AND FN_IS_NUMBER_CHK(C.CREDIT_AMT) = 1 AND FN_IS_NUMBER_CHK(C.CREDIT_FEE) = 1 AND C.CREDIT_AMT IS NOT NULL AND C.CREDIT_FEE IS NOT NULL
AND LENGTHB(C.CREDIT_AMT) <= 13 AND LENGTHB(C.CREDIT_FEE) <= 13
AND C.CREDIT_BANK IN ('국민은행', '하나은행') ) ttecck, TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh WHERE 1=1 AND tsspc.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SUBSTR(tsspc.APPR_DT, 1, 8) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND SUBSTR(tsspc.APPR_DT, 1, 8) = ttecck.APPR_DATE AND tsspc.APPR_NO = ttecck.APPR_NO
AND tssh.ORG_BILL_NO IS NULL
AND tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspc.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tssh.HQ_BRAND_CD = tsspc.HQ_BRAND_CD AND tssh.STORE_CD = tsspc.STORE_CD AND tssh.SALE_DATE = tsspc.SALE_DATE AND tssh.POS_NO = tsspc.POS_NO AND tssh.BILL_NO = tsspc.BILL_NO ) B ON ( A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = B.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND A.HQ_BRAND_CD = B.HQ_BRAND_CD AND A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.SALE_DATE = B.SALE_DATE AND A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO AND A.BILL_NO = B.BILL_NO AND A.LINE_NO = B.LINE_NO AND A.LINE_SEQ_NO = B.LINE_SEQ_NO ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.CREDIT_DATE = B.CREDIT_DATE, A.CREDIT_AMT = B.CREDIT_AMT, A.CREDIT_FEE = B.CREDIT_FEE, A.CREDIT_BANK = B.CREDIT_BANK, A.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.HQ_OFFICE_CD, A.HQ_BRAND_CD, A.STORE_CD, A.SALE_DATE, A.POS_NO, A.BILL_NO, A.LINE_NO, A.LINE_SEQ_NO, A.CREDIT_DATE, A.CREDIT_AMT, A.CREDIT_FEE, A.CREDIT_BANK, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.HQ_OFFICE_CD, B.HQ_BRAND_CD, B.STORE_CD, B.SALE_DATE, B.POS_NO, B.BILL_NO, B.LINE_NO, B.LINE_SEQ_NO, B.CREDIT_DATE, B.CREDIT_AMT, B.CREDIT_FEE, B.CREDIT_BANK, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )
